luckily when it comes to crochet it isn t hard to adjust your yarn weight and hook size accordingly to make the same product if you want a similarly sized whale you ll need a weight five yarn and a 5 0mm crochet hook notes - this pattern works in spiral rounds unless otherwise indicated - the whale should measure approximately 2 5 in / 6 35 cm in diameter and about 1 5 in / 3 8 cm in height when completed use a different hook if you d like a different size -
